text: Pus (aey payghumber!) tum aisa sabar kero jaisa sabar aali himmat rasoolon ney kiya aur inn kay liye (azab talab kerney mein) jaldi na kero yeh jiss din iss azab ko dekh len gay jiss ka wada diye jatay hain to (yeh maloom honay lagay ga kay) din ki aik ghari hi (duniya mein) theray thay yeh hai pahgham phoncha dena pus badkaron kay siwa koi halak na kiya jaye ga
